reasoning: Mild intellectual disability measured as prevalence (lifetime condition). Estimated 1% (1000 per 100k) global prevalence, with mild forms representing approximately 85% of all intellectual disability cases. Prevalence metric is appropriate for this chronic developmental condition.
source: Maulik PK et al. (2011). Prevalence of intellectual disability: a meta-analysis of population-based studies. Res Dev Disabil. 32(2):419-436
